name: LVUTF
description: Execute unit tests defined with the LabVIEW Unit Test Framework and report in JUnit format
author: Matt Pollock

inputs.name: lvPrjPath
inputs.label: LabVIEW Project Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path to .lvproj file that contains the unit tests to run

inputs.name: lvRptPath
inputs.label: Report Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path to .lvproj file that contains the unit tests to run
